newsitem.title: USA: CBOT, KCBT, MGE wheat move sharply higher.
newsitem.headline: CBOT, KCBT, MGE wheat move sharply higher.

text.p: Wheat futures at the three major U.S. futures exchanges sped sharply higher in late trading as buying accelerated in reaction to higher than expected U.S. wheat exports last week and a halt for now to European Union subsidized sales, traders said.
Also buoying prices was a weekend freeze that crop experts said damaged a large amount of Kansas wheat.
The EU said it would not subsidize any more export wheat sales until July, a move that could enhance demand for U.S. wheat, traders said.
